title: His Gift
description: Owin has a surprise for Maurina unlike anything she could have anticipated. Ever her Master, he's determined to fulfill all of her fantasies, even the ones she doesn't admit to ... like having two men at once.Now, on their first anniversary, he has a surprise for her that will take her to heights of ecstasy she's never experienced before, but is she ready to accept his special gift?
author: Gillian Colbert
